name: useBoolean
description: Custom hook that handles boolean state with useful utility functions.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The initial value for the boolean state (default is `false`).

returns.name: setFalse
returns.description: Function to set the boolean state to `false`.

returns.name: setTrue
returns.description: Function to set the boolean state to `true`.

returns.name: setValue
returns.description: Function to set the boolean state directly.

returns.name: toggle
returns.description: Function to toggle the boolean state.
